pages.text: A rune with a very specific purpose, this allows for the breaking and repurposing of mob spawners. Activate it to turn a spawner block into a broken item, which can be re activated in the $(l:infusion/combiner)Soul Combiner$(/l).
Run cost: 600 Tears$(br)$(l:cages/tier_iii)Tier III Soul Cage$(/l)$(br2)
